recipesJson.name: Apple Faqs
recipesJson.author: Darthy
recipesJson.description: a unique apple cereal/desert. it can't make up its mind what it wants to be, and that's okay. this is NOT Apple Jacks cereal. though this is a product of me trying to make an apple jacks cereal. didn't end up where i wanted but the destination i ended up at worked great too so it stayed as a recipe, and was/is an ADV of mine.
